5002.name: Unknown
5002.message:
You must have started Miiverse
at least once before you can
use this online service.

Please start Miiverse from
the HOME Menu and set up
your user information
5002.long_description: This error occurs when you have never opened the Miiverse app before attempting to use online features.
5002.short_solution: Boot the Miiverse applet from the home screen and complete setup
5002.long_solution: Open the Miiverse app from the HOME Menu.
